definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Suddenly a great cockchafer buzzed along. Alas!
sentences.chinese: 突然一隻的金龜子嗡嗡嗡飛過。

sentences.english: Dung beetles belong to the family Scarabaeidae and are also known as scarabs.
sentences.chinese: 糞甲蟲屬於金龜子家族，與聖甲蟲一樣有名。

sentences.english: 5A noble chafer beetle which relies on the decaying wood of old fruit trees.
sentences.chinese: 一隻相貌尊貴的金龜子甲蟲正以老果樹的腐木爲食。

sentences.english: Presently a large cockchafer flew by;
sentences.chinese: 這時有一隻很大的金龜子飛來了。

sentences.english: Suddenly a great cockchafer buzzed along. Alas!
sentences.chinese: 突然一隻很大的金龜子嗡嗡嗡飛過。

sentences.english: The species of scarabs attacking chestnuts were investigated in Hexi Forest Farm, Jingning County.
sentences.chinese: 景寧縣鶴溪林場板栗林遭金龜子危害嚴重。

sentences.english: The boat now came close to our beetle's ship, and the young girls fished it out of the water.
sentences.chinese: 現在船開的更近我們的金龜子的船了。

sentences.english: "How conceited you are!" exclaimed the beetle.
sentences.chinese: “你可真夠自以爲是的，”金龜子大叫。

sentences.english: Rose chafers are found over southern and central Europe and the southern part of the UK.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰金龜子一般生活在歐洲中南部和英國南部。

sentences.english: Sure enough, the heat saves the beetles energy.
sentences.chinese: 無疑的，溫度給金龜子節約了能量。

sentences.english: Suddenly a great cockchafer buzzed along.
sentences.chinese: 突然一隻很大的金龜子嗡嗡嗡飛過。
